info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:45PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River Near Mermentau. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 PM CST Monday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 4.4 Mon 11 pm CS 4.3 4.2 4.1 &&
